title: Excel Import with Multiple Sheets
description: Verify that the system correctly imports Excel files with multiple sheets, including automatic header detection, date conversion, and handling of merged and formatted cells without data loss.

steps.description: Upload a multi-sheet Excel file containing production and target data with merged cells and formatted headers.
Verify that all sheets are imported correctly with proper header recognition.
Validate that merged cells' data is accurately converted and displayed.
Confirm dates are automatically converted to the correct format.

title: Data Validation for Missing SAP Codes and Inconsistencies
description: Check the system auto-identifies missing SAP codes and data inconsistencies during Excel import, and alerts the user appropriately.

steps.description: Upload an Excel file with some missing SAP codes and inconsistent data entries.
Verify the system detects missing SAP codes and flags inconsistent records.
Confirm user receives clear alert messages indicating the issues.

title: Dashboard KPI Display Accuracy
description: Verify that all KPIs (Total Production, Average Gas and Energy Consumption, Average Yield, Productivity, Setup Time, Estimated Extra Cost) are calculated correctly and displayed in real-time on the dashboard.

steps.description: Upload valid daily production and target data Excel files.
Confirm all KPIs on the dashboard match expected values based on the input data.
Verify KPI values update dynamically when data changes.

title: KPI Target Comparison with Color Coding
description: Validate that dashboard charts show daily production vs target and specific consumption over time, with accurate color-coded visual indicators reflecting whether targets are met.

steps.description: Upload production and target data with values above, at, and below targets.
Verify charts reflect correct target comparisons.
Check color coding matches target achievement status (e.g. green for meeting, red for missing).

title: Hybrid Forecasting Accuracy
description: Test month-end forecasting that combines executed production data with planned orders to provide accurate projections.

steps.description: Provide partial month executed production and planned orders data.
Confirm forecasted month-end production is correctly calculated and displayed.

title: Scenario Simulator Responsiveness and Accuracy
description: Verify scenario simulator allows user input for variables like remaining workdays, expected efficiency, and daily production rate, and instantly updates forecast projections accordingly.

steps.description: Access scenario simulator component.
Adjust remaining workdays, expected efficiency, and daily production rate.
Verify forecasts update immediately reflecting input variable changes.

title: Cost Configuration and Waste Calculation Accuracy
description: Check that users can configure unit costs for inputs, and that the system calculates financial waste with precision based on these costs.

steps.description: Open cost configuration modal and input unit costs for relevant inputs.
Verify that configured costs are saved.
Trigger waste calculation on dashboard.
Validate that estimated extra cost reflects the newly configured unit costs accurately.

title: Batch Upsert of Target Data to Supabase
description: Verify secure persistence of target data using batch 'Upsert' functionality through spreadsheet upload to Supabase backend.

steps.description: Upload updated target data spreadsheet to trigger batch upsert.
Verify data is correctly saved in Supabase without duplication or loss.
Confirm upsert operation does not break when data contains existing and new records.

title: Date Filtering for Partial Month Analysis
description: Check that filtering data by date range correctly adjusts dashboard KPIs and charts for partial month analysis.

steps.description: Apply date filter for a subset of the current month.
Verify all KPI values and charts update to reflect only the filtered date range.

title: Report Export to PDF and Image
description: Validate export functionality generates accurate, readable PDF and image reports matching the on-screen dashboard content.

steps.description: Trigger export of current dashboard view as PDF.
Check PDF content matches on-screen dashboard layout and data.
Trigger export of current dashboard view as image.
Verify image export accurately captures dashboard visuals and data.

title: Production Plan Comparison Mode Display
description: Verify the comparison mode enable users to visually evaluate different production plan versions side-by-side.

steps.description: Activate production plan comparison mode.
Load two different production plan data sets.
Check that both plans are displayed clearly with differences highlighted.

title: System Performance with Large Data Sets
description: Test UI responsiveness and performance when handling large Excel files and data sets to ensure no lag or crashes occur client-side.

steps.description: Upload a large Excel file with extensive multi-sheet production data.
Confirm UI remains responsive during and after data import.
Navigate through dashboard components and simulator.
Verify no performance degradation or rendering issues.

title: Secure Backend Integration Using Environment Variables
description: Verify that sensitive data and API keys required for Supabase backend integration are managed securely using environment variables, and that the system does not expose such information.

steps.description: Review application runtime environment and source code for configuration.
Confirm that Supabase credentials are accessed via environment variables only.
Verify no credentials are hard-coded or exposed in client-side code.
